message: This proposal aims to ensure a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the current value of money
Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose a more equitable split to ensure both parties are satisfied.
I'm willing to give up some of my gain to ensure we reach a deal, but I think 45 is a fair compromise considering the current value of money
